li.p: Using the polygon tool, from the drop-down menu, select the Polygon tool and create a arbitrary triangle with labeled vertices.
Create an two arbitrary (and distinct) points in the sketch. Label them P and Q. Construct vector \overrightarrow{PQ} by using the vector tool.
Using the transformation tool, select the "Translate by Vector" option and translate the triangle by vector \overrightarrow{PQ}.
